title: Looking for a couple of Cards - Schulte's Back Side & Mcgraw Port c Cap

posts.post_title: Looking for a couple of Cards - Schulte's Back Side & Mcgraw Port c Cap
posts.post_content:
Schulte Rear View - VGEX to EX - PSA or SGC
McGraw Portrait with Cap - VGEX - PSA or SGC

Any back will do as long as it is there.;)

Let's see 'em.

Thanks.

Frank--Email send on Pfeffer.

Cheers, Mike

Hi Frank,

$67 delivered for this one.  I would call it a 4.5.

Let me know.
The response in the last week or so has been underwhelming.
